title: Price ceiling on graph with letter areas

content.question: If a price ceiling is set at P1, which of the following areas represent the resulting consumer surplus, producer surplus, and deadweight loss?

choices.label: Consumer Surplus Producer Surplus Deadweight Loss f k l + m
Consumer Surplus Producer Surplus Deadweight Loss f + g + h k + l h + j
Consumer Surplus Producer Surplus Deadweight Loss f + g + h i + j + k l + m
Consumer Surplus Producer Surplus Deadweight Loss f + g + i k h + j
Consumer Surplus Producer Surplus Deadweight Loss f + g + i h + j l + m

content.answer: Consumer Surplus Producer Surplus Deadweight Loss f + g + i k h + j

topic.text: 2.8: The Effects of Government Intervention in Markets

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
